entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Wiarton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:55 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 09:46 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: -0.8°C
Wind: E 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this morning. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 late this afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
